title: In a few days, I shall re-enter the ranked world.
body:
I feel I have improved, and though I am not amazing, I feel like I can now do better than I was when I started ranked. I have a terrible w/l rate in ranked, and am digging myself out of a deep hole. 

Is there any advice that may help me on my journey? I'd post my lolking, but like I said... it is pretty horrendous, and i'm not sure it accurately reflects me as a player currently.

advice is welcome. ah what the hell, here yall go.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/27263914
